value.title: Go to Agent's webpage on XVision

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  vtid,
  vtname "Agent name", vthostname "Hostname",
  CASE vtbdaemonstatus
    WHEN 0 THEN '⁉️ Undetermined'
    WHEN 0 THEN '♻️ Check'
    WHEN 4 THEN '⚠️ Network error'
    WHEN 8 THEN '⛔ Stopped'
    WHEN 16 THEN '✅ Running'
    WHEN 32 THEN '⏸️ Suspended'
    END "Agent status",
      CASE vtmanagerstatus
    WHEN 0 THEN '⁉️ Undetermined'
    WHEN 0 THEN '♻️ Check'
    WHEN 4 THEN '⚠️ Network error'
    WHEN 8 THEN '⛔ Stopped'
    WHEN 16 THEN '✅ Running'
    WHEN 32 THEN '⏸️ Suspended'
    END "Manager status"
    FROM
      vt_core_hosts

SELECT
  vtname as "Environment",
  CASE
    WHEN vtenginepid = 0 THEN 'Stopped 🔴'
    WHEN vtenginepid <> 0 THEN 'Running 🟢'
  END "Status",
    CASE
    WHEN vtenginepid = 0 THEN 'Start'
    WHEN vtenginepid <> 0 THEN 'Stop'
END "Action"
FROM
  vt_core_environments
WHERE
  CASE
    WHEN 
      $Environments <> 'all' THEN vt_core_environments.vtname = $Environments
    ELSE 
      TRUE
  END

panels.description: Threshold is avg for last 30 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  --vtenvname as Environnement ,
  vtexpdatevalue::date as Day,
  '"year":'||DATE_PART('year',vtexpdatevalue)||',"month":'||DATE_PART('month',vtexpdatevalue)
  ||',"day":'||DATE_PART('day',vtexpdatevalue) as Filter ,
CASE 
    WHEN $Environments <> 'all' THEN
      CASE WHEN $Applications <> 'all' THEN 
       '&filters={"condition":"AND","filters":{"environments":{"name":{"comparator":"EQUALS","valueToCompare":"'||$Environments||'"}},"applications":{"name":{"comparator":"EQUALS","valueToCompare":"'||$Applications||'"}}}}'
      ELSE
        '&filters={"condition":"AND","filters":{"environments":{"name":{"comparator":"EQUALS","valueToCompare":"'||$Environments||'"}}}}'
      END
    ELSE
      ''
    END filterEnvtApp,
  count(*) as Nombre
FROM vt_stats_job 
WHERE CASE 
    WHEN $Environments <> 'all' THEN
      CASE WHEN $Applications <> 'all' THEN 
        vtstatus=4 AND vtexpdatevalue >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' AND vtenvname = $Environments AND vtapplname = $Applications 
      ELSE
        vtstatus=4 AND vtexpdatevalue >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' AND vtenvname = $Environments
      END
    ELSE
      vtstatus=4 AND vtexpdatevalue >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'
    END
GROUP BY --vtenvname,
 vtexpdatevalue
 order by to_char(vtexpdatevalue,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT 
  count(*)/30 as AvgErrors
FROM vt_stats_job 
WHERE CASE 
    WHEN $Environments <> 'all' THEN
      CASE WHEN $Applications <> 'all' THEN 
        vtstatus=4 AND vtexpdatevalue >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' AND vtenvname = $Environments AND vtapplname = $Applications 
      ELSE
        vtstatus=4 AND vtexpdatevalue >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' AND vtenvname = $Environments
      END
    ELSE
      vtstatus=4 AND vtexpdatevalue >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'
    END

panels.title: Number of errors per day

value.title: Go to Visual TOM Dates monitoring

targets.rawSql:
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(vtjobsid)>0 THEN '🔒Blocked' ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN (left(text(to_timestamp(vtvalue/1000000)),10)::date!=CURRENT_DATE AND (vtswitchtime * interval '1 sec'- INTERVAL '24 hours')::time < CURRENT_TIME) THEN '🕒Late' ELSE '' END "Status",
LEFT(text(to_timestamp(vtvalue/1000000)),10) "Value", vtname "Date", (vtswitchtime * interval '1 sec') "Switch time",
CASE vttype WHEN 'A' THEN 'Automatic' WHEN 'S' THEN 'System' ELSE 'Constant' END "Type",
CASE vtrecovery WHEN '0' THEN '✔️' ELSE '-' END "Automatic recovery", CASE WHEN COUNT(vtjobsid)>0 THEN COUNT(vtjobsid)|| ' Jobs' ELSE '-' END "Blocking Jobs", vtid from vt_core_dates dates
LEFT JOIN vt_core_date_blocking_jobs bloc_jobs ON dates.vtid=bloc_jobs.vtdateid
WHERE (left(text(to_timestamp(vtvalue/1000000)),10)::date!=CURRENT_DATE AND (vtswitchtime * interval '1 sec'- INTERVAL '24 hours')::time < CURRENT_TIME)
OR vtjobsid IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY vtid

panels.description: Statuses are clickable to access Job's monitoring in XVision

targets.rawSql:
SELECT vt_core_jobs.vtstatus, COUNT(*)
FROM 
  vt_core_jobs
  JOIN vt_core_applications USING (vtappsid)
  JOIN vt_core_environments ON vt_core_applications.vtenvsid = vt_core_environments.vtsid
WHERE
  CASE
    WHEN $Environments <> 'all' THEN 
    CASE
      WHEN $Applications <> 'all' THEN 
        vt_core_environments.vtname = $Environments AND vt_core_applications.vtname = $Applications
      ELSE 
        vt_core_environments.vtname = $Environments
    END
    ELSE 
      TRUE
  END
  GROUP BY vt_core_jobs.vtstatus

panels.title: Jobs statuses distribution

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  vt_core_environments.vtname || '/' || vt_core_applications.vtname || '/' || vt_core_jobs.vtname as "Jobs",
  vtmessage as "Message",
  vt_core_environments.vtname as Env,
  vt_core_applications.vtname as App,
  vt_core_jobs.vtname as Job, 
  CASE
    WHEN vt_core_jobs.vtsubstatus = 0 THEN 'Not taken into account'
    WHEN vt_core_jobs.vtsubstatus = 1 THEN 'Taken into account'
  END "Mark",
  '' AS "Action"
FROM
  vt_core_jobs
  JOIN vt_core_applications USING (vtappsid)
  JOIN vt_core_environments ON vt_core_applications.vtenvsid = vt_core_environments.vtsid
WHERE
  CASE
    WHEN $Environments <> 'all' THEN CASE
      WHEN $Applications <> 'all' THEN 
        vt_core_jobs.vtstatus = '4' AND vt_core_environments.vtname = $Environments AND vt_core_applications.vtname = $Applications
      ELSE 
        vt_core_jobs.vtstatus = '4' AND vt_core_environments.vtname = $Environments
    END
    ELSE 
      vt_core_jobs.vtstatus = '4'
  END

list.definition:
SELECT vt_core_applications.vtname AS "Application"
FROM vt_core_applications
JOIN vt_core_environments ON vt_core_applications.vtenvsid = vt_core_environments.vtsid
WHERE vt_core_environments.vtname = $Environments
list.name: Applications
list.query:
SELECT vt_core_applications.vtname AS "Application"
FROM vt_core_applications
JOIN vt_core_environments ON vt_core_applications.vtenvsid = vt_core_environments.vtsid
WHERE vt_core_environments.vtname = $Environments
